examples.translation: 他每隔一段时间就回来看看我们。
examples.first: He comes back to see us at regular

examples.translation: 原定茶点休息后继续进行的比赛因下雨而取消了。
examples.first: The continuation of the play after the tea

examples.translation: 车辆之间应保持适当的间距。

n: a definite length of time marked off by two instants
a set containing all points (or all real numbers) between two given endpoints
间隔,休息时间, (数学)区间, (音乐)音程
